original_name: Miimu iro iro yume no tabi
plot: A little pink genie from a computer, helps two kids learn about important people and events from history by taking them to those times.
plot_en: A little pink genie from a computer, helps two kids learn about important people and events from history by taking them to those times.
plot_es: A little pink genie from a computer, helps two kids learn about important people and events from history by taking them to those times.
title: Miimu iro iro yume no tabi
